attributes.action: Give people with mental health issues a fair assessment by Atos, Capita,Maximus.
attributes.additional_details:
i think this needs to change by giving a fair assessment by a trained person and they need to let are real doctors have more of a say instead of assessors who have not been trained properly in these type of areas as how can they be allowed to over rule doctors.

plus all assessments should HAVE to be recorded.

PLEASE SIGN AND REPOST EVERYWHERE YOU CAN MANYTHANKS
attributes.background: I suffered from a unfair assessments by ATOS for my pip claim as they don't have any staff really trained in mental health problems i had a letter from my gp,support worker and welfare rights helping me plus i was on 4 lots of medication by age 35 with me suffering with depression and anxiety.
